sourcesContent:
<template>
  <d2-container>
    <template slot="header">发布任务</template>
    <el-row class="d2-text-center">
      <el-col :span="7"></el-col>  
      <el-col :span="2"  style="margin-top:25px">任务名称： </el-col>  
      <el-col :span="6">
        <el-input v-model="input1" placeholder="任务名称"></el-input> 
       </el-col>
      <el-col :span="9"></el-col>  
    </el-row>
    <el-row class="d2-text-center" style="margin-top:20px;">
      <el-col :span="7"></el-col>  
      <el-col :span="2"  style="margin-top:25px">起止时间： </el-col>  
      <el-col :span="6">
        <el-input v-model="input2" placeholder="开始时间  -  结束时间"></el-input> 
       </el-col>
      <el-col :span="9"></el-col>  
    </el-row>
    <el-row class="d2-text-center">
      <el-col :span="7"></el-col>  
      <el-col :span="2"  style="margin-top:25px">任务描述： </el-col>  
      <el-col :span="6">
        <el-input v-model="input3" type="textarea" :rows="3" placeholder="请输入你的任务需要达成的目标"></el-input> 
       </el-col>
      <el-col :span="9"></el-col>  
    </el-row>
    <el-row class="d2-text-center" style="margin-top:20px;">
      <el-col :span="7"></el-col>  
      <el-col :span="2"  style="margin-top:25px">添加图片： </el-col>  
      <el-col :span="6">
        <el-input v-model="input4" placeholder="" size="small"></el-input> 
       </el-col>
      <el-col :span="9"></el-col>  
    </el-row>
    <el-row class="d2-text-center" style="margin-top:20px;">
      <el-col :span="7"></el-col>  
      <el-col :span="2"  style="margin-top:25px">酬劳： </el-col>  
      <el-col :span="6">
        <el-input v-model="input4" placeholder="￥" size="small"></el-input> 
       </el-col>
      <el-col :span="9"></el-col>  
    </el-row>
    <el-row class="d2-text-center" style="margin-top:50px"> 
      <el-button type="primary">发布</el-button>
    </el-row>
    
  </d2-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'page2',
  data() {
    return{
      input1:'',
      input2:'',
      input3:'',
      input4:''
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style  scoped>
.el-col {
  margin-top :20px;
}
</style>
